metadata.title: Fishers Finery Tranquil Dreams Ecofabric Nightgown with Bralette Top
features: MADE FROM VIABLE EcoFabric - Help save and protect Mother Earth with this environmentally conscious shirt. It is made from natural materials: 70% Viscose derived from Bamboo, 25% Organic Cotton, and 5% Spandex.

WIDE RANGE OF COLORS ? There is a wide range of colors for you to choose from! Available in black, moonlight blue, sea glass, lavender fog, gray, and heather gray, and heavenly pink ? there is definitely something that will suit your preference.
Our TRANQUIL DREAMS collection is moisture wicking for all night comfort with fully adjustable straps.
Perfect combination of support and coverage with a high waist Bodice top with Enhanced Built in Bralette for added support. Perfect for Nursing.

EASY-CARE ? Fishers Finery?s Tranquil Dreams Sleep V-neck Tee requires no special treatment during cleaning and washing. Just machine wash with cold water and dry afterwards. It does not wrinkle easily so there is no need to iron it out.
description: Our Tranquil Dreams nightshirts are long enough to be comfortable but short enough to be flattering. This tank style chemise is loose and extremely comfortable. The bodice gathers at the high waist producing a fit that is as comfortable as it is flattering. The top has adjustable straps, adjusting both in length and may be crossed for added support. The top is constructed from the heavier version of our EcoFabric found in our yoga pants, providing additional support and coverage. Our Tranquil Dreams nightwear is both warm and cool with its wicking and has a soft embrace that is not restricting. It is a great alternative to pajamas or shorty gowns of not so natural materials. This Chemise works perfect for Moms that are Nursing or as a Beach Coverup!

title: The EcoFabric Sleepwear Collection | FISHERS FINERY
